# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-service-nslcm-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1053/org/openo/sdno/nslcm/nslcm-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/nslcm-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-service-nslcm-1.0.0-RC0.zip && rm -f sdno-service-nslcm-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8545
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1053 > VERSION
